#summary Notes about the ICAT workshop in Dublin in Ireland in March 2014
#labels Featured

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= Meeting in Ireland in 2014 =

ICAT and PaNdata F2F meeting in Dublin .

The ICAT meeting is from lunch time 24th of March to lunch time 25th of March.

The dinner will be in the evening on the 24th. 

= Date and location of the workshop =

The workshop will be held as part of the RDA 2014 conference during the week of 24-28 March 2014 in Dublin, Ireland.  The ICAT meeting is from mid-day on Monday 24 March to mid-day on Tuesday 25 March 2014.  It is expected that most people attending the ICAT workshop will also attend the RDA conference which follows on Wednesday 26 March to Friday 28 March 2014.

Wireless networking will be available at the venue.

= Attending =

If you are interested in attending this meeting please contact tom.griffin@stfc.ac.uk or alistair -dot- mills -at- stfc -dot- ac -dot- uk.

= Agenda =

The purpose is to discuss plans for the development and use of ICAT at facilities and by projects such as Pandata and Crisp.

All times are too specific to be realistic.  The names are indicative.  The agenda is likely to change.
